requirements.reputation: must have reputation greater than or equal to this
requirements.under reputation: must have reputation below or equal to this
talking: people need to be talking to
using: items that could be being used
locations: locations this action could trigger in
actions: actions that need to previously have been done
computer: a computer one needs to be on
solved: computers that need to have been solved
mode: mode one needs to be in

results.dialogue: you really should get to work. today is your first day! your car is in the garage, so get to it and be on your way.) Explore rooms with 'explore' and 'inspect [object]', and use 'nearby' and 'map' to figure out where to go. also, you'll need to figure out the passwords to you laptop and phone, so look around inside stuff in your room for a hint.
(Jacob) Hey, that's my sandwich! I spent all morning making it and ... yeah, give it back.

Welcome to your first day at SORT Incorporated! (there are many employees in this branch of the company, and in order to interact with them, all you have to do is go to their cubicle/office and say hello. (to give things to people, talk to them to let them know what you want to give them))
Your Boss hands you a to-do list, and you hesitantly accept it (not too hesitantly, however). Your phone buzzes right after you recieve the list.
This is your cell phone. You can use it to check your email.

This is your laptop. It has some stuff on it, and you can use it to make it look like you're doing work when you're at SORT. you're in your bedroom right now, using your laptop. to exit out of the laptop and go into the real world, use 'exit'. to explore what's on your laptop, use 'ls' and 'cd [dir]'. use 'help' to get computer commands.
you have recieved an email from Sorth
(Talos) hello there! I'm your boss, and my name is Talos so please refer to me as that when you are trying to talk to me.
(Ian) hey! what are you doing with that file, you're just a newbie! give that to me.

(hint: great job breaking into Ian's laptop! Now, you should take a look at Jessica's, and then other peoples's. You need to figure out things about their personality, explore their offices, and use your avaliable programs to crack their codes. good luck!)
(Ian) why do you have my gold club! get your own.
(Jessica) could you go run this paper over to Kenneth? here's a little reward for you too.
(Kenneth) oh no, you DO have more papers from her. she's always giving me more and more work ... all the time ...
you have recieved an email from Sorth
you have recieved an email from Sorth
you hve recieved an email from Sorth
your reputation sank so low that that Talos had no choice but to fire instantly such a miserable employee.

(Teresa) also, so, there's something you could help me with. could you go that postcard in Jessica's cubicle? the one with her and Ian on it? I'd really appriciate it, and if you do, I'll give you some juicy gossip about the other employees. deal?

(Jessica) what the hell player! that's private.
(Jessica snatches away the postcard and puts it back in its place.)
(Teresa) oo this is perfect! I really appriciate you getting this. here's a few pieces of info that I've gathered myself.
(Larry) go give these faxes to the Boss, they just came in.
(Talos) Thank you for these, now go get on with the rest of your work.
(Janitor) a bit late to be at work, wouldn't you say?

actions: enter SORT at night first time

results.dialogue: (Janitor) *glances up at you suspiciously*

actions: enter SORT at night second time

results.dialogue: (Janitor) still snooping around here at night? (the Janitor eyes you suspiciously, then continues cleaning the floor)
